Control.name: reg_satprt_sat_core
Control.desc: reg_satprt_sat_core: 4x will be coring to cor(irgb_max-irgb_min) to calculate the oy_delt, the smaller the more protection to color, the larger only the rich color will be protected.

Control.name: reg_satprt_sat_rate
Control.desc: reg_satprt_sat_rate: rate to cor(irgb_max-irgb_min) to calculate the oy_delt,the larger the more protection to color; norm 16 as 1

Control.name: reg_satprt_csc_mode
Control.desc: reg_satprt_csc_mode: CSC mode of current yuv input: 0:601; 1:709; 2:BT2020 NCL; 3:reserved

Control.name: reg_satprt_is_lmt
Control.desc: reg_satprt_is_lmt: flag telling the YUV is limited range data or full rang data; 1 is limited data

Control.name: reg_satprt_enable
Control.desc: reg_satprt_enable: 1 to enable of saturation protection for dnlp adjustments
